sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_ex_sp.PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax = Class.create();
PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    syncExtensibleMenuItems: function() {
        var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId');
        var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_tableName');
        var portalExtensibleNavigation = new sn_ex_sp.PortalExtensibleNavigationUtil();
        var output = portalExtensibleNavigation.syncPortalExtensibleNavItems(sysId, tableName);
        if (output.status == 'SUCCESS' && output.count == 0) {
            gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Sync complete - everything is up to date, no new changes detected.'));
        } else if (output.status == 'SUCCESS' && output.count > 0) {
            if (output.count == 1) {
                gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Sync complete - {0} new item added. It may be nested under another item in the hierarchy.', output.count.toString()));
            } else {
                gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Sync complete - {0} new items added. Some items may be nested under other items in the hierarchy.', output.count.toString()));
            }
        } else {
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Sync incomplete - There was a problem syncing the menu items. Please try again.'));
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    },

    fetchPortalMenuItemsData: function() {
        var portalExtensibleNavRecordId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId');
        var portal = this.getParameter('sysparm_portal');
        var active = this.getParameter('sysparm_active');
        var portalExtensibleNavigation = new sn_ex_sp.PortalExtensibleNavigationUtil();
        if (active == 'true' && portalExtensibleNavigation.getActivePortalNavRecord(portal)) {
            return;
        }
        portalExtensibleNavigation.populatePortalNavigationData(portalExtensibleNavRecordId, portal);
    },

    type: 'PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-15 13:34:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3e372437778f11105b8dddad7c5a995d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PortalExtensibleNavigationAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center" source="sn_ex_sp">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3e372437778f11105b8dddad7c5a995d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-04 06:58:10</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
